greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows in which the n-th row begins with n and contains n terms of an Arithmetic progression with a common difference of (n-1).
comment: n-th row sum gives the sum corresponding to the magic square of order n.
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Mar 25 2003
ext: Corrected and extended by _David Wasserman_, Jun 03 2004
